data.title: Susan Bernstein Maul
data.meta_description: Valdosta Today - Susan Bernstein Maul Susan Bernstein Maul, 76, of Valdosta, passed away on Saturday, January 9, 2021 at Fellowship Home.
data.text:
Susan Bernstein Maul, 76, of Valdosta, passed away on Saturday, January 9, 2021 at Fellowship Home. She was born in Brooklyn, New York on July 5, 1944 to the late Joseph Bernstein and Rhoda Levine Bernstein. Mrs. Maul lived in New Jersey prior to moving to Valdosta in 1990 and worked as a medical receptionist for over 25 years. She was active in Temple Israel and participated in the Valdosta Choral Guild.

Mrs. Maul is survived by her husband Glen Warren Maul, of Valdosta, a daughter, Jennifer (Scott) Messer, of Athens, GA, a son, Josh Maul, of Townsend, GA, a granddaughter Grace Messer, of Athens, GA, a brother, Alan Bernstein (Deborah Davis) of Valdosta, and a sister Lisa (Steve) Dixon, of Peachtree City, GA.

Mrs. Maul will be cremated, and no services will be held at this time. In lieu of flowers donations may be made to Halcyon Hospice, 515 St Augustine Road, Suite D, Valdosta, GA 31601. Condolences to the family may be conveyed online at www.mclanecares.com. Carson McLane Funeral Home.
